original: 東萊掖縣人，歷仕曹魏、西晉。公正耿直，好批評人物，曾上書建議晉武帝廢止九品中正制。但亦因嚴苛剛正，得罪權貴，終生位不及三公。
text: A native of Yexian County, Donglai, who served in the Cao Wei Dynasty and the Western Jin Dynasty. Fair and honest, good critic, once wrote to suggest that Emperor Wu of Jin abolish the nine-grade Zhongzheng system. However, because of his strictness and integrity, he offended the powerful, and his life was not as good as the three males.
